publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-803 Mr Andy Kerr on behalf of the Transport and the Environment Committee: Telecommunications Inquiry—That the Parliament notes the 3rd Report, 2000 of the Transport and the Environment Committee, Report on the inquiry into proposals to introduce new planning procedures for telecommunications developments (SP Paper 90), and commends the recommendations to the Scottish Executive.

S1M-803 Mr Andy Kerr on behalf of the Transport and the Environment Committee: Telecommunications Inquiry—That the Parliament notes the 3rd Report, 2000 of the Transport and the Environment Committee, Report on the Inquiry into Proposals to Introduce New Planning Procedures for Telecommunications Developments (SP Paper 90), and commends the recommendations to the Scottish Executive.
S1M-803 Telecommunications Inquiry (lodged on 3 May 2000) Dr Sylvia Jackson*
